snippet: The transformation of the region’s political systems has taken a violent turn in many corners.
abstract: Memo from Beirut; ordinary citizens across Middle East wonder how long fallout from Arab Spring will keep their lives in state of upheaval and what their lives will be like once things settle down.

byline.contributor: Hwaida Saad contributed reporting from Beirut.

lead_paragraph: The transformation of the region’s political systems has taken a violent turn in many corners.

headline.seo: Turn to Violence Across Middle East Raises Questions
headline.main: As Arab Spring’s Glow Fades and Turmoil Rises, Unsettling Questions
headline.print_headline: As Arab Spring’s Glow Fades and Turmoil Rises, Unsettling Questions

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
